Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/Fairbanks
ShortDescription: Westbound 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand,Fairbanks, Ontario and State: due to,street blockage near Grand/Fairbanks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63W West 63rd  buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand,Fairbanks, Ontario and Stateincluding the normal route streets at the beginning and end, due to street blockage near Grand/Fairbanks.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Grand/Fairbanks
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and State: due to,street blockage near  Grand/Fairbank.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses buses are temporarily rerouted via  Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and State including the normal route streets at the beginning and end, due to street blockage near  Grand/Fairbanks.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Monroe
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are standing at Monroe due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are standing at Monroe due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
